name: Italian Quinoa Salad
author: Annita
summary: I created this recipe when I ran out of pasta and needed to make a quick salad for a potluck. This versatile recipe has become one of our favorites for taking to picnics and for eating after a workout. Eat immediately or refrigerate 2 hours to overnight for best flavor. Quinoa really soaks up the dressing, so you may want to add more to taste after the refrigeration period.
ingredients: ¼ cup finely chopped red onion
directions: Bring water, quinoa, and chicken bouillon to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender and water has been absorbed, 15 to 20 minutes
Remove saucepan from heat and cool quinoa to room temperature, about 30 minutes
Mix quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, feta cheese, and red onion together in a bowl
Pour Italian dressing over quinoa mixture and stir to coat
